casebody.data:
In the Matter of the Search Warrant Heretofore Issued Affecting Premises Known as The STONE HOUSE, PELHAM BAY PARK, NEW YORK, N. Y. August Sperl and Frank J. Olsen, Petitioners-Appellants. No. 100. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 11, 1931. Seymour B. Quel, of New York City, for appellants. George Z. Medalie, U. S. Atty., of New York City (David Marcus, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel).

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
